title: Understanding Data Through Statistical Modeling
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: From Data to Impact
text:
DATA SCIENCE · BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE
      
    

    
    
      
        
        From Data to Impact
      
        I'm Mulimbika Makina, a Data Scientist with an MSc in Mathematics (Data Science Option),
        combining mathematical depth with statistical rigor to solve real-world problems.
      

      
        With expertise in Python, SQL, R,
        SPSS, STATA, Power BI, and
        Metabase, I build predictive models and intuitive dashboards that unlock real value.

title: End to End Machine Learning CI/CD Pipeline
text:
The initial phase in deploying a machine learning model involves translating a business concept into a well-defined machine learning problem statement.
The subsequent phase entails formulating the architectural design to outline the structure and components of the end-to-end pipeline.

This article explores each stage of the machine learning lifecycle, from ideation to deployment, supported by hands-on examples and best practices.

title: End to End Machine Learning CI/CD Pipeline
text:
2.1 1.1 Business Goals

Reduce churn by 15%
Improve targeting of retention campaigns

title: End to End Machine Learning CI/CD Pipeline
text:
2.2 1.2 ML Problem Statement
Transform this into a binary classification task.

title: End to End Machine Learning CI/CD Pipeline
text:
2.3 1.3 KPIs

Accuracy, Precision, Recall, F1-Score
Customer Retention Rate

title: End to End Machine Learning CI/CD Pipeline
text:
4.1 3.1 Data Ingestion

Load data from CSV, database, or cloud storage
Use version control (e.g., DVC)
